def fix_xml_ampersands(xml_str):
    """Replace all lone '&' characters by '&' in XML"""
    
    import re
    pattern = re.compile(r'&(?!amp;)')
    replaced_xml_str = pattern.sub('&', xml_str)

    return replaced_xml_str
